risk_factors: The person is a 20-year-old male, which indicates that he might be at a higher risk of recidivism due to his age.
The person identifies himself as White, which doesn't seem to have any significant impact on the likelihood of rearrest or recidivism.
The person has been arrested 5 times and convicted, indicating a high risk of recidivism.
Height and weight don't seem to have any significant impact on the likelihood of rearrest or recidivism.
The person is not married and lives alone, which might indicate a higher risk of engaging in criminal activities.
Lack of high school diploma or GED certificate and not being enrolled in college indicates a high risk of recidivism.
Having held 1 job during the year doesn't seem to have any significant impact on the likelihood of rearrest or recidivism.
Not using drugs in the past four years might indicate a higher risk of engaging in criminal activities.
Feeling depressed over the past month doesn't seem to have any significant impact on the likelihood of rearrest or recidivism.
Living with a biological mother in an urban area and household size of 3 indicates a high risk of recidivism.
Considering that God has nothing to do with what happens to him personally doesn't seem to have any significant impact on the likelihood of rearrest or recidivism.

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is a 20-year-old male who identifies himself as White. He has been arrested 5 times and has been convicted. He is 6 feet 3 inches and weighs between 200 and 224 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He does not have a high school diploma or GED certificate and is not enrolled in college. He has held 1 job during the year. He has not used any drugs in the past four years and has not felt depressed over the past month. At a young age, he lived with his biological mother in a household of size 3, in an urban area. He considers that God has nothing to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
